timeline.bodyText: Lets also add a function to convert OzoneFileStatus to FileStatus ?

timeline.bodyText: why are we deleting only the first entry ? and ignoring the rest of the entries here ?
timeline.author: mukul1987

replies.bodyText: the keys in the keyset belong to the same volume and bucket.hence just reading the volume and bucket from the first entry. we are not ignoring other entries. all entries are deleted .
replies.author: sadanand48
